channel.title: Keep Pull Requests Small
channel.description: reviewing a big PR is always hard and we easily miss track of what is removed or changed. I propose to **strictly** not allowing PR's bigger than **~500** lines. changes on generated files and updates on vendor should be done in separate commits and not count inside the line limitation.

item.title: Keep Pull Requests Small
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
